Posts.Content: I agree with patsymc. Besides conventional look elsewhere. Take a look at the book, "Beating Cancer With Nutrition" by Patrick Quillin. It can be purchased on Amazon for $17. A nutritional approach is a must. "Sugar Feeds Cancer" is especially highlighted by Quillin. Starve the cancer is the approach this book takes.
Posts.Title: Breast cancer metastasized to liver stage 4
